comment._content:
George,
We dont know. During several years the Lisbon municipality has promote annualy this kind of exhibition.

comment.author: 9657534@N03
comment._content: If we think that this group of photographs were taken during the same event, we could related them to the 2nd National Floriculture Exhibition, in Lisbon Tapada da Ajuda park, during the Summer of 1941 (the 1st Exhibition was in June of 1940) as some of the pictures were used to illustrate an article about that event, in Panorama magazine #2 (July 1941), pp. 4-5.
